text: Okwy Diamondstar is an Australian retired footballer. ==Career== ===Indonesia=== Recommended to Persis Solo prior to the 2007–08 Liga Indonesia Premier Division,PEMAIN ANYAR DI PERSIS Komunitas PasoepatiALVIEN KIE AREP DI "DOL" Komunitas Pasoepati Diamondstar eventually put pen to paper on the deal.Siang Ini Ebi Teken Kontrak Suara Merdeka (Archived) ===India=== Called to test for Mohun Bagan partway through August 2010,Bagan to call Okwy for trials under POA quota Times of India he was listed prior to the Mariners matchup with Chirag United,Sports - In The City - Diamondstar signs The Telegraph (Calcutta) debuting as they fell 1–0.Chirag United stun Mohan Bagan 1-0 Times of India Claiming that Mohun Bagan owed him a part of his salary and medical expenses, he lodged a complaint to the AIFF and FIFA but it was dismissed by a city court, alleviating Mohun's pressure to pay.Reprieve for Mohun Bagan in Diamondstar case Sportskeeda == References == == External links == * SportsTG Profile Category:Australian people of Nigerian descent Category:Living people Category:Expatriate footballers in India Category:Expatriate footballers in Indonesia Category:Persis Solo players Category:Mohun Bagan A.C. players Category:Stirling Lions SC players Category:Australian soccer players Category:Australian expatriate soccer players Category:I-League players Category:Association football defenders Category:Floreat Athena FC players Category:Western Knights SC players Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Okwy Diamondstar
